description: Lists the authentication options for the currently signed-in user. Returns the following: Authorize this action with a signed-in user's access token. It must include the scope aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

parameters.name: AccessToken
parameters.description: A valid access token that Amazon Cognito issued to the currently signed-in user. Must include a scope claim for aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The name of the user who is eligible for the authentication factors in the response.

nested_items.name: PreferredMfaSetting
nested_items.description: The challenge method that Amazon Cognito returns to the user in response to sign-in requests. Users can prefer SMS message, email message, or TOTP MFA.

nested_items.name: UserMFASettingList
nested_items.description: The MFA options that are activated for the user. The possible values in this list are SMS_MFA, EMAIL_OTP, and SOFTWARE_TOKEN_MFA.

nested_items.name: ConfiguredUserAuthFactors
nested_items.description: The authentication types that are available to the user with USER_AUTH sign-in, for example ["PASSWORD", "WEB_AUTHN"].
